simple encoder and decoder network.with: only the local loss ( ED - Local )

baseline model.from sentence: We start with baseline model which we take as a simple encoder and decoder network with only the local loss ( ED - Local ) .

encoder - decoder and a discriminator ne.from sentence: Further we have experimented with encoder - decoder and a discriminator network with only global loss ( EDD - Global ) to distinguish the ground truth paraphrase with the predicted one .

variation of our model.used: both the global and local loss ( EDD - LG )
variation of our model.from sentence: Another variation of our model is used both the global and local loss ( EDD - LG ) .

network.with: both the losses ( EDD - LG ( shared ) )

discriminator.from sentence: Finally , we make the discriminator share weights with the encoder and train this network with both the losses ( EDD - LG ( shared ) ) .
